short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that embeds Last.fm features into Spotify

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The goal of this extension is to bring Last.fm to Spotify, making discovering and enjoying music more social and fun!

The extension currently supports: 
1) Last.fm Shoutbox for artist and album pages on Spotify 
2) Last.fm playcount chart for album pages on Spotify
